Introduction¶

EasyDev can you help to develop macros in LibreOffice.

Installation¶

  • Download lates version from GitHub.
  • Open LibreOffice
  • Tools -> Extension manager...
  • Add...

Test installation¶

Sub Test()
    'Create service
    util = createUnoService("org.universolibre.EasyDev")

    MsgBox util.VERSION
End Sub
